info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana and northeastern Newton Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burr Ferry, or 8 miles southeast of Toledo Bend Dam, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toledo Bend Dam, Burkeville, Burr Ferry, Mayflower, Wiergate, and Evans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
